name: Monitoring

description.fr_FR: Plugin pour surveiller vos systèmes Linux, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC et routeurs ASUS-WRT (locaux ou distants via SSH) : distribution, uptime, charge système, RAM, swap, disques, réseau, CPU, températures et commandes personnalisées.
description.en_US: Plugin to monitor your Linux systems, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC and ASUS-WRT routers (local or remote via SSH): distribution, uptime, system load, RAM, swap, disks, network, CPU, temperatures and custom commands.
description.es_ES: Plugin para supervisar sus sistemas Linux, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC y routers ASUS-WRT (locales o remotos a través de SSH): distribución, uptime, carga del sistema, RAM, swap, discos, red, CPU, temperaturas y comandos personalizados.
description.de_DE: Plugin zur Überwachung Ihrer Linux-Systeme, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC und ASUS-WRT-Router (lokal oder remote über SSH): Distribution, Uptime, Systemlast, RAM, Swap, Festplatten, Netzwerk, CPU, Temperaturen und benutzerdefinierte Befehle.
description.it_IT: Plugin per monitorare i tuoi sistemi Linux, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC e router ASUS-WRT (locali o remoti tramite SSH): distribuzione, uptime, carico del sistema, RAM, swap, dischi, rete, CPU, temperature e comandi personalizzati.
description.pt_PT: Plugin para monitorizar os seus sistemas Linux, NAS (Synology, QNAP, Medion), Proxmox, LXC e routers ASUS-WRT (locais ou remotos via SSH): distribuição, uptime, carga do sistema, RAM, swap, discos, rede, CPU, temperaturas e comandos personalizados.

utilization: Créez un équipement, définissez son type (local/distant SSH), activez les commandes souhaitées et configurez les seuils d'alerte pour une surveillance optimale.
author: TiTidom
